about_the_game:
Sip on some hot tunes you know and love with the soundtrack to the cult classic Sippin Hot Blickety Block N Bop Those Bad Battle Boys Down To Size Supreme!

Comprising of over 10 ear-melting minutes, this album features music by distinguished artists Kat Siu and Christian White.

Sippin Hot Blickety Block N Bop Those Bad Battle Boys Down To Size Supreme: The Original Soundtrack includes the 5 original tracks from the game PLUS a BONUS track.
